medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced RUQ pain for 2 days, managed with Maalox and Motrin with some relief. The pain became more generalized after dinner, prompting significant distress at 2 am. The patient had not passed flatus and had no bowel movement for 1 day, along with nausea/vomiting and chills, but no fever.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of tuberculosis diagnosed by chest X-ray, currently on INH and rifampin; history of congestive heart failure (CHF) signs but normal echocardiogram; status post hysterectomy; history of benign thyroid nodule; hypertension; asthma; status post bilateral knee replacements; status post right breast lumpectomy for a benign lesion.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had breast cancer; grandmother died from a heart attack; aunt had colon cancer; brother died from renal failure and was on dialysis.
